heading.summary: best way to save what you love
support.github: check out DownloadAny's source code, contribute changes, or report issues
support.discord: chat with the community and developers about DownloadAny or ask for help
support.twitter: follow DownloadAny's updates and development on your twitter timeline
support.telegram: stay up to date with latest DownloadAny updates via a telegram channel
support.bluesky: follow DownloadAny's updates and development on your bluesky feed
support.description.issue: if you want to report a bug or some other recurring issue, please do it on github.
support.description.help: use discord for any other questions. describe the issue properly in #DownloadAny-support or else no one will be able help you.
support.description.best-effort: all support is best effort and not guaranteed, a reply might take some time.
